II Encuentro Sobre Lepidoptera Neogropical, ELEN II. Smithsonian Tropical Research Institute. [Ciudad de Panamá](/lgrs/Panama.qmd), Panamá, 29 de abril al 3 de mayo de 2007.


```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| output: asis

library(FlickrAPI)
suppressMessages(library(dplyr))
suppressMessages(here::i_am("lgrs/Trieste.qmd"))
file_name <- here::here("data","flickr-photos.rds")
all_photos <- readRDS(file=file_name)

seleccion <- c("Participantes del II ELEN",  "Presentación de Ángel", "Presentaciones ELEN II")

photos <- all_photos %>% filter(title %in% seleccion) %>% slice_sample(n=1)
photos_info <- getPhotoInfo(photo_id = photos$id, output = "url")

cat(sprintf("<center>\n<img src='%s' width='%s'  height='%s'>\n<br/>\n**%s** by <a href='%s' target='flickr'>JR Ferrer Paris @ flickr</a><br/></center>", 
         photos$url_m, photos$width_m, photos$height_m,
         photos$title,
         photos_info$content))
```
